mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posted_news(news_date, news_comment, user_id, register_user_id, register_date, update_user_id, update_date, version, status) VALUES(#{newsDate}, #{newsComment}, #{userId}, #{registerUserId}, #{registerDate}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateDate}, #{version}, #{status} );
mapper.select: SELECT news_id, news_date, news_comment, user_id, register_user_id, register_date, update_user_id, update_date, version, status FROM posted_news WHERE status != 9 ORDER BY news_date DESC;
mapper.delete: UPDATE posted_news SET update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, version = version+1, status = #{status} WHERE news_id = #{newsId}
